text: Robert L. Middleton (January 22, 1941 – June 25, 2010) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Ohio Northern University in Ada, Ohio from 1970 to 1973, compiling a record of 15–21. A college football player at Ohio State University under Woody Hayes, Middleton was drafted by the Buffalo Bills in the 1963 AFL Draft. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American football ends Category:Ohio Northern Polar Bears football coaches Category:Ohio State Buckeyes football players Category:High school football coaches in Michigan
title: Bob Middleton (American football)
